Package it.polimi.is23am10.client.userinterface

Class GraphicUserInterface

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.is23am10.client.userinterface.GraphicUserInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInterface, Serializable
public final class GraphicUserInterface extends javafx.application.Application implements UserInterface, Serializable
A client interface using a graphic UI as I/O.
